PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2013-02722013-03-07,  ,  FIN,  , 
ActNunavut Act
SubjectNunavut Borrowing Limits Regulations
PrecisNUNAVUT BORROWING LIMITS REGULATIONS in order to modernize the governance of the borrowing limits to ensure accurate reporting of borrowing obligations against the borrowing limits and consistency with reporting in the annual territorial consolidated financial statements.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2013-0040 Publication Date: 2013-03-27
